name: billing_account_id
description: GCP billing account identifier - primary key for organization mapping

name: service_id
description: GCP service identifier (e.g., compute.googleapis.com)

name: service_description
description: Human-readable service name (e.g., Compute Engine)

name: sku_id
description: SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) identifier for the resource type

name: sku_description
description: Human-readable SKU description

name: usage_start_time
description: When resource usage started - used for time-based analysis

name: usage_end_time
description: When resource usage ended - used for time-based analysis

name: project_id
description: GCP project identifier where resource was used

name: project_name
description: Human-readable project name

name: project_number
description: GCP project number

name: location_location
description: Resource location (e.g., us-central1, europe-west1)

name: location_region
description: Geographic region

name: location_zone
description: Availability zone

name: resource_name
description: Resource name/identifier

name: resource_global_name
description: Fully qualified resource name

name: cost
description: Total cost in billing currency - primary cost metric

name: currency
description: Billing currency code (e.g., USD, EUR)

name: currency_conversion_rate
description: Conversion rate to USD if currency is not USD

name: usage_amount
description: Usage quantity (e.g., GB-hours, API calls)

name: usage_unit
description: Unit of measurement for usage (e.g., byte-seconds, requests)

name: usage_amount_in_pricing_units
description: Usage amount converted to pricing units

name: usage_pricing_unit
description: Pricing unit (e.g., gibibyte hour)

name: cost_type
description: Type of cost (regular, tax, adjustment, rounding_error)

name: credits_total
description: Total credits applied (sum of all credit amounts)

name: credits_json
description: Detailed credits breakdown as JSON string

name: cost_at_list
description: Cost at list price before any discounts

name: invoice_month
description: Invoice month (YYYYMM format)

name: labels_json
description: User-applied resource labels as JSON string for flexible querying

name: system_labels_json
description: System-applied labels as JSON string

name: x_ingestion_id
description: Unique row identifier (UUID) for traceability

name: x_ingestion_date
description: Date when data was ingested - PARTITION KEY

name: x_org_slug
description: Organization identifier for multi-tenancy

name: x_hierarchy_entity_id
description: N-level hierarchy: Leaf entity ID from org_hierarchy. Example: 'TEAM-001'.

name: x_hierarchy_entity_name
description: N-level hierarchy: Leaf entity display name. Example: 'Platform Team'.

name: x_hierarchy_level_code
description: Hierarchy level code (DEPT, PROJ, TEAM)

name: x_hierarchy_path
description: N-level hierarchy: Materialized path from root to leaf. Example: '/DEPT-001/PROJ-001/TEAM-001'.

name: x_hierarchy_path_names
description: N-level hierarchy: Human-readable path. Example: 'Engineering > Platform > Backend Team'.

name: x_hierarchy_validated_at
description: When hierarchy was validated

name: x_pipeline_id
description: Pipeline template name. Example: cloud_cost_gcp

name: x_credential_id
description: Credential ID from org_integration_credentials. KEY for multi-account isolation

name: x_pipeline_run_date
description: The DATA date being processed. KEY for idempotent re-runs. CLUSTER KEY for partition pruning.

name: x_run_id
description: Unique pipeline run UUID for full traceability

name: x_ingested_at
description: Timestamp when data was written to this table

name: x_data_quality_score
description: Data quality validation score (0.0-1.0)

name: x_created_at
description: Record creation timestamp

name: x_cloud_provider
description: Cloud provider identifier (aws, azure, gcp, oci)

name: x_cloud_account_id
description: Normalized cloud account/subscription ID
